ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics
Class InspectCommentActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.InspectCommentActivity
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateCommentActivity, EditCommentActivity, MapsActivity
public class InspectCommentActivity
extends Activity

This source file holds the methods for the CreateCommentActivity as well as the EditCommentActivity. These are both called when a user hits the '+' button to either create/edit a comment based on where they are in the software. This source file can initiate the camera and load a image from the gallery (both tasks shrink the image file to 200x200px without filtering.
